resources.string: User name must start with a letter and follow with any combination of letters, numbers, periods and underscore with minimum length of 6 characters.

Software Engineer for the last 18 years. Before this I was a Pre-Med major and I went to the Baylor University for Medicine, but realized it was not for me.
Create community to become a \ncommunity moderator.

You're not in any communities right now. 
Join a community to start connecting 
with others to build a mentor-mentee 
relationship.

PRIM is a community-based virtual mentoring platform with social media capabilities. We provide real human interaction through our opt-in virtual mentoring in these difficult and challenging times to help improve people\'s lives. Whether you\'re into social, lifestyle, education, or business, you’ll find an inviting, warm, and supportive communities on PRIM ready to assist you.

Here is why we can be a difference maker:

* One-on-one direct virtual mentoring
* Community-based support
* Provide a "Board of Advisors"
* Potentially life-changing help for the better
* Absolutely no cost to PRIM users.
Camera permission are necessary in order to capture image.
Anyone can see who\'s in the community and what they post.

"Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged." "It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

You will earn the following tokens when you participate on PRIM.
For being a \"Mentor\" to each Mentee.
For creating and moderating an approved community.
For each user who subsequently joins your community.

The PRIM Team is working to fix the issue.
